    • 方法详细资料

      • sendAggregatedValue

        public boolean sendAggregatedValue(String aggregatorName,
                          org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable aggregatedValue)
                            throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
        Sends worker aggregated value to the owner of aggregator
        指定者:
        sendAggregatedValue 在接口中 WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
        参数:
        aggregatorName - Name of the aggregator
        aggregatedValue - Value of the aggregator
        返回:
        True if aggregated value will be sent, false if this worker is the owner of the aggregator
        抛出:
        IOException

      • flush

        public void flush()
           throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
        Flush aggregated values cache.
        指定者:
        flush 在接口中 WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
        抛出:

      • sendAggregatedValuesToMaster

        public void sendAggregatedValuesToMaster(byte[] aggregatorData)
                                  throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
        Sends aggregated values to the master. This worker is the owner of these aggregators.
        指定者:
        sendAggregatedValuesToMaster 在接口中 WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
        参数:
        aggregatorData - Serialized aggregator data
        抛出:
        IOException

      • distributeAggregators

        public void distributeAggregators(Iterable<byte[]> aggregatorDataList)
                           throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
        Sends aggregators to all other workers
        指定者:
        distributeAggregators 在接口中 WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
        参数:
        aggregatorDataList - Serialized aggregator data split into chunks
        抛出:
        IOException
